monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Cuts through vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: When landing a critical hit, heal the whole party by 20% of the damage dealt. Increases critical chance by 7%.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Assault Mastery
skills.description: This monster can receive an additional Stack of Might, Sorcery and Glory. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Assault Shield
skills.description: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (500 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Fatal Cut
skills.description: 2 x 160% (320%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt, applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Fireclaws
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: First Impact
skills.description: Increases the base damage of the first hit of an attack by an additional 40% of Attack (physical) or Magic (magical). (25% for mass attacks)

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Lifelink
skills.description: When landing a critical hit, heal the whole party by 20% of the damage dealt. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Long Slash
skills.description: 1 x 160% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Precision
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.description: Critical Hits regenerate 7 Mana.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Severe Hit
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Armor Break (Debuff) and a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +60%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 135% (270%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +70%

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Support
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Support Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Support Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Sure Strike
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 10% increased Critical Chance and cannot be dodged.

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Wind Affinity
skills.description: Wind attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
